#include <stdio.h>

int main(void) {
    int t; scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        unsigned long long int k=0,n,m=7,i; scanf("%llu",&n);
        for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
        {
            k=(k+m%1000000007)%1000000007;
            m=m*10+7;
        }
        printf("%llu\n",k);
    }
	// your code goes here
	return 0;
}
